text: Ad pwanehôen wid ijehlen, d igrawen, ar Loahennama. Mi bbwven $uôes, u llint tebbura s, ad asen inin iâssasen is: "day ur kwen in usan ara imazanen, segwen, mmalen awen issekniyen n Mass nnwen, nedôen kwen af temlilit n wass nnwen agi"? A d inin: "Ih. Maca, ad iûaô wawal uâaqeb, af ijehliyen".
